start_date_help: Start date of your training plan (must be a Monday)
race_date_help: Date of your target race (must be a Sunday)
min_weeks_warning: Warning: The preparation must last at least {weeks} weeks.
pace_order_warning: Warning: Paces must follow the order: 5K < 10K < Half < Marathon
volume_help: Volume will gradually increase from minimum to maximum
intermediate_race_date_help: Date of the intermediate race (must be a Sunday)
race_impact_info: Intermediate races influence your training plan by automatically adjusting the volume of affected weeks
paces_explanation: Paces must follow the order: 5K < 10K < Half < Marathon (the longer the distance, the slower the pace).
paces_saved: Your paces have been successfully saved.
